info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 3:24PM PDT until July 23 at 3:45PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM PDT/345 PM MST/ FOR WEST CENTRAL MOHAVE AND EAST CENTRAL CLARK COUNTIES... At 323 PM PDT/323 PM MST/, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of South Cove, or 28 miles southeast of Overton, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs and trees. Locations impacted include... Temple Bar Campground, Echo Bay, Echo Bay Campground, South Cove, Lake Mead National Recreation Area and Temple Bar. This includes the following roads... Pierce Ferry Road between mile markers 43 and 44. Temple Bar Road between mile markers 25 and 26. State Route 167 in Clark County near mile marker 29. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If on or near Lake Mead, including South Cove, Temple Bar, the Virgin Basin and the Overton Arm, get away from the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. remember, lightning can strike out to 15 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
